results.title: Immunometabolic modulators alleviate vascular dysfunction in mice with systemic lupus erythematosus.
results.text_hl: Moreover, the activation of AMPK in the vascular wall by @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2DG@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ improved @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@.

citations.NLM: Miñano S, Moleón J, González-Correa C, Jiménez R, Gómez-Guzmán M, Martín-Morales N, O'Valle F, Romero M, Toral M, Duarte J. Immunometabolic modulators alleviate vascular dysfunction in mice with systemic lupus erythematosus. Biochem Pharmacol. 2025 Jul 12;241():117154. PMID: 40659125
citations.BibTeX: @article{40659125, title={Immunometabolic modulators alleviate vascular dysfunction in mice with systemic lupus erythematosus.}, author={Miñano S and Moleón J and González-Correa C and Jiménez R and Gómez-Guzmán M and Martín-Morales N and O'Valle F and Romero M and Toral M and Duarte J}, journal={Biochem Pharmacol}, volume={241}, pages={117154}}

results.title: Metformin suppresses aortic ultrastrucural damage and hypertension induced by diabetes: a potential role of advanced glycation end products.
results.text_hl: The advanced glycation end products (AGEs) play an important role in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-mediated @DISEASE_Vascular_System_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D057772 @@@vascular injury@@@. We tested whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can suppress aortic AGEs production and protect against @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001018 @@@aortic injuries@@@ (aortopathy) and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@streptozotocin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@) animal model.

citations.NLM: Dallak M, Haidara MA, Bin-Jaliah I, Eid RA, Amin SN, Abdel Latif NS, Al-Ani B. Metformin suppresses aortic ultrastrucural damage and hypertension induced by diabetes: a potential role of advanced glycation end products. Ultrastruct Pathol. 2019;43(4-5):190-198. PMID: 31522593
